price: 3. dans le pays tout proche, mais après leur défaite, ils seront vainqueurs,
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
